## Instructor

![](images/team/gwynn.jpg){style="float:right;padding: 0 0 0 10px;" fig-alt="Headshot of Dr. gwynn sturdevant" width="150"}

[Dr.Â gwynn sturdevant](http://nzgwynn.com/) (she/her/ella) is a Lecturer at Wharton. gwynn's work focuses on revamping introductory statistics and data science curriculum, connecting recent advances in human computer interaction to statistical programming languages, and community-led research involving those facing entrenched inequalities. She is an [International keynote speaker](https://www.instagram.com/p/Bzk0cgeiBne/?igshid=ftictlwmqckp) and co-founder of the [Harvard Data Science Initiatives's R User Group](https://rug-at-hdsi.org/).
